questions.text: What is the main purpose of instructional design training for convention volunteers?

questions.text: What does WIIFM stand for in instructional design?
questions.hint: This addresses the learner's motivation and relevance.

questions.text: Which learning principle emphasizes that adults bring existing knowledge to new learning situations?
questions.hint: Think about how adults' life experiences affect their learning.

questions.text: Design one ABCD learning objective for a convention volunteer training session and explain how each component (A, B, C, D) is addressed in your objective.
questions.suggestion: Example Answer: 'After completing the safety protocol training (Condition), convention ushers (Audience) will be able to demonstrate (Behavior) proper emergency evacuation procedures with 100% accuracy (Degree).' Explanation: - Audience: Convention ushers (specific learner group) - Behavior: Demonstrate evacuation procedures (observable action) - Condition: After safety protocol training (context) - Degree: 100% accuracy (measurable standard)

questions.text: What is the primary advantage of using video content in volunteer training?

options.a: It eliminates the need for in-person training
options.b: It provides consistent, reusable demonstration of procedures

questions.hint: Consider the benefits of visual demonstration and consistency across multiple training sessions.
